summary: The module creates a Conan‑aware Makefile that defines variables for each package and its components, aggregates global build settings, and supports customizable prefix flags for libraries, includes, defines, etc., enabling GNU Make projects to consume Conan dependencies without a full toolchain integration.
business_intent: Provide an automated way to expose Conan package information to Make‑based build environments, simplifying compilation and linking of projects that rely on Conan‑managed libraries.
